description:
Approval of details pursuant to conditions 131 and 136 of planning permission Ref.: P00/0434 dated 10th June 2002, relating to section through link curtain walling, amendments to north elevation and plant room louvre and facing materials of proposed hotel. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  PC02, PC03, samples board.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding details included on the 'External Material Samples' board, details of the colour of external render shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, prior to commencement of that part of the development (i.e. application of external render panels). The terracotta colour shown on the samples board shall not be used. 

 REASON: To ensure that the Local Planning Authority may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building.
